biography.intro: A tryhard weeb who likes to code sometimes.
biography.paragraph1: I come from Chittaranjan, a small town in India, which I'd say is the best part of the country. It's full of nature and not a concrete jungle.
biography.quote: "I want to become the Max Verstappen of F1 and destroy my opponents."
biography.paragraph2: With a ton of heart, it can work.

blog_page.header_description: Thoughts on LLMs, Next.js, and Rust (sometimes) anything tech!
blog_page.newsletter_description: Get notified when I publish new insights on tech and design.
